text.title: Use Your Thinking
text.head: Use Your Thinking
text.p: This Article will show you how to use your brain and think positively , be successful , and exploit others ' failures .
text.head: Steps
First Thing

list.item:
All of the humanity knows how to think , but have you ever tried to think in a way that you know your thinking is right ? Have you pushed your thinking to the limits ? Ordinary people like us have made inventions for many years . For instance , Thomas Edison had invented electricity , Albert Einstein had created the theory of the speed of light , and Isaac Newton exposed the law of gravity . These individuals neither were not super heroes nor were they extra-ordinary people . What they all did were using their brains and knew how to think in an unadulterated way . The apple that fell on Newton ’s head made him think . If he had n’t sit under the apple tree , maybe he would n’t have established the laws of gravity . Also , if there were not Edison , we would n’t get electricity ever . Nowadays , scientists still using the laws of these old-school scientists to discover new theories and develop new advances to help the humanity live a modern life style . In the same way , Apple Company would n’t be that popular if it did n’t have the creator of iPhones ( Steve Jobs ) . There are many successful people who have altered the whole humanity by bringing new ideas to human ’s life-style . This article is a simple guide that could give you a unique description to let a person exploit his/her time to benefit the human beings , raise his/her name , and get good profit . There are a lot of people who have skills that they are not going to find in others . At the same time , they do not exploit their talents and show the world how much they are skillful .
You can acknowledge that thinking rationally is inherited from 1 . Our genetic endowment . 2 . Our geological system . 3 . Our cognitive system ( perceptions , thoughts , and memories ) 4 . The social environment . 5 . The cultural environment . 6 . Our previous life experiences ( including your childhood . ) 7 . Our personal characteristics ( including personal intelligence , mental health , and personality ) . Book by : Michael W. Eyenck Page numb : 4 Book title : Psychology Student Handbook .

text.head: Use Your Surroundings

list.item: Every moment you fall down , try to talk with someone that is really close to you . That one might know you more than yourself , and he/she could give you enough motivation to make you stand up again and keep moving forward . The reason is sometimes motivational advises would push a person to the limits and inspire him/her achieve his/her goals . And , by saying surroundings I do n’t mean that you should just talk with people . You might get motivated by watching a movie , a picture of something that could touch you hard , or a circumstance that might change the whole of your personality in a small period of time . “ Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it . ” Dwight D. Eisenhower . On the other hand , train yourself to motivate yourself is a conjecture that lead a person to inspire himself by visualizing positive thinking in his/her brain . This state could vary many dis-courage people .

text.head: Read Books

list.item: Most of you might think and say that this section is totally weird . But , after all , most of the time , reading books would change a person ’s life in many aspects . First , he/she will get new information as well as being more educated , and the feeling of being educated is really an astonishing reaction . Intellectuality will increase a person ’s confidence . Try not to read a book , do n’t even watch T. V , and do n’t read any newspaper or magazine for a year . Just hang out with your friends and do n’t talk about any new ideas or any new things . Try to talk about a specific thing that you want to talk about every time . You will realize that you are in an “ everyday routine cycle ” and this will lead you to get psychological issues . A person might be frustrated and feel that he/she has not achieved any single ambitions while they might be really smart and ambitious . This life is full of spots of success , but we should have enough to know how to fill these spots . “ Whenever you read a good book , somewhere in the world a door opens to allow in more light . ” Vera Nazarian .

text.head: Exploit Others ’ Failure

list.item: It is has been said many times that people have to learn from their mistakes . But , have you ever thought to learn from others ’ failures ? Probably not . According to Bill Gates , “ It is fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure . ”
